0: python manage.py migrate && python manage.py collectstatic -v 2 --noinput && python manage.py runserver --nostatic --noreload 0.0.0.0:3334

curl -s -d "The local restic check failed" -H "Title: Backups" -H "Tags: rotating_light" "http://ntfy.comms.svc.cluster.local/homelab"
curl -fsS -m 10 --retry 5 -o /dev/null "http://healthchecks.monitoring.svc.cluster.local/ping/${HEALTHCHECKS_RESTIC_LOCAL_CHECK_UUID}/fail"

curl -s -d "The remote restic check failed" -H "Title: Backups" -H "Tags: rotating_light" "http://ntfy.comms.svc.cluster.local/homelab"
curl -fsS -m 10 --retry 5 -o /dev/null "http://healthchecks.monitoring.svc.cluster.local/ping/${HEALTHCHECKS_RESTIC_REMOTE_CHECK_UUID}/fail"

- job_name: node-exporter
  scrape_interval: 1m
  scrape_timeout: 10s
  honor_timestamps: true
  static_configs:
    - targets:
        - "opnsense.${PRIVATE_DOMAIN}:9100"

until [ -f /snapshots/kopia.repository.f ]; do
    printf "\e[1;32m%-6s\e[m\n" "Waiting for the Kopia repo to become ready ..."
    sleep 1
done

id: heisenbridge
url: http://heisenbridge:9898
as_token: fHzDW35fFZB9Yvu1rPW6kKqvaZJmQdB1ghgfbsZtlrFDyoTfN5ddfio1jrB25Qoc
hs_token: 0qQMO2VQvJkfwbNuVKolnrVQkovzyXuRcKoaQvrMO6sySwTem7hgkrsdBKY4cd36
rate_limited: false
sender_localpart: heisenbridge
namespaces:
    users:
    - regex: '@irc_.*'
      exclusive: true
    - regex: '@heisenbridge:.*'
      exclusive: true
    aliases: []
    rooms: []

version: 2
global:
  private_key: /etc/dendrite/matrix_key.pem
  server_name: "${SECRET_PRIVATE_DOMAIN}"
  well_known_server_name: "dendrite.${SECRET_PRIVATE_DOMAIN}:443"
  well_known_client_name: "https://dendrite.${SECRET_PRIVATE_DOMAIN}:443"
  database:
    connection_string: postgresql://dendrite:${SECRET_DENDRITE_DB_PASSWD}@postgresql/dendrite?sslmode=disable
  cache:
    max_size_estimated: 600mb
  report_stats:
      enabled: true
  jetstream:
    storage_path: "/jetstream"
app_service_api:
  config_files:
    []
media_api:
  base_path: /media
client_api:
  registration_shared_secret: "${SECRET_DENDRITE_REGISTRATION_SHARED_SECRET}"
mscs:
  mscs:
    - msc2836 # Threading
    - msc2946 # Spaces
    - msc2444 # Peeking over federation
    - msc2753 # Peeking via sync
sync_api:
  search:
    enabled: true
    base_path: /search
    language: "en"
logging:
  - type: std
    level: debug
